HEIST.Settings.AutoRegisterBabele.Title: Automatically activate translation via Babele
HEIST.Settings.AutoRegisterBabele.Hint: Automatically sets up translations within Babele without needing to point to the directory containing the translations.
HEIST.Global.Name: Name
HEIST.Blackjack.Label: BLACKJACK!
HEIST.Blackjack.Explanations: Agent {name} collects all the cards he just played and the others collect 2 from their pile!
HEIST.Cards.RecallHand: Agent {name} recovers his hand and shuffles his deck.
HEIST.Cards.RecallFromPile: Agent {name} recovers {number} card(s) from his pile and shuffles his deck.
HEIST.CardWindow.Result.Title: Test result
HEIST.CardWindow.Result.Success: Agent, your test is a success!
HEIST.CardWindow.Result.Failure: Unfortunately agent, your test is a failure.
